LanguageData.VQEA_AncientChemfuelGenerator.label: древний химтопливный генератор
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientChemfuelGenerator.descriptio: A bulky chemfuel-powered generator from a bygone era. It produces large amounts of power but needs to be manually “kicked” back into operation when it stalls.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientBioBattery.label: ancient biobattery
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientBioBattery.description: An old power vat that dissolves a living creature inside it to generate electricity. The power output varies based on the bodysize of the creature, and the duration depends on the creature’s mass.
